data.comment: The first-half is under way at Bosuilstadion - Antwerp kick-off to start the match.
Dieumerci Mbokani heads in to make it 1-0 at Bosuilstadion.
In the minute 45, Dylan Batubinsika (Antwerp) gets a yellow card.
Jonathan Lardot blows to start the second-half. Gent with the kick-off.
In the minute 53, Sven Kums (Gent) has received a first yellow card.
Nill De Pauw for Antwerp has been booked by Jonathan Lardot and receives a first yellow card.
Laurent Depoitre is replacing Roman Yaremchuk for the away team.
In the minute 75, The home team replace Lior Refaelov with Simen Juklerod.
Anderson Niangbo is on a sub for Roman Bezus for Gent.
Antwerp make their second substitution with Martin Hongla replacing Pieter Gerkens.
In the minute 84, Brecht Dejaegere is replacing Niklas Dorsch for Gent at Bosuilstadion.
Antwerp make their third substitution with Junior Pius replacing Birger Verstraete.
It's 1-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
